text: Ezɨ gɨn Juda uan ivozir amizim Tamar mɨgɨa ghaze, “Nɨn pam areme. Kamaghɨn, nɨ uamategh uan afeziamɨn dɨpenimɨn mangɨ, egh magh ikɨtɨ nan otarim Sela an ekeveka.” Juda kamagh nɨghnɨgha atiatigha mɨgɨrɨgɨar kam gami, Sela uan avebamningɨn mɨn ovegham. Ezɨ Tamar ua uan afeziamɨn dɨpenimɨn ghugha iti.
